commit_type.title: Improvements
commit_type.description: An improvement to a current feature

commit_type.title: Styles
commit_type.description: Changes that do not affect the meaning of the code (white-space, formatting, missing semi-colons, etc)

commit_type.title: Code Refactoring
commit_type.description: A code change that neither fixes a bug nor adds a feature

commit_type.title: Performance Improvements
commit_type.description: A code change that improves performance

commit_type.title: Tests
commit_type.description: Adding missing tests or correcting existing tests

commit_type.title: Builds
commit_type.description: Changes that affect the build system or external dependencies (example scopes: gulp, broccoli, npm)

commit_type.title: Continuous Integrations
commit_type.description: Changes to our CI configuration files and scripts (example scopes: Travis, Circle, BrowserStack, SauceLabs)

commit_type.title: Chores
commit_type.description: Other changes that don't modify src or test files
